name: ImageS3
body:
ImageS3 is an Amazon S3 based image hosting service for developers. It is designed as a web service to store, resize and manage images for all your web and mobile applications in one place.

###Features 
 * Images are stored and organized into image plants.
 * Design template to resize images in pixels or percent.
 * On-the-fly resizing with only one template name.
 * REST API for easy application integration.
 * A web interface to quick access everything.

###Requirements
 * Java 7 or higher.
 * An Amazon S3 account (http://aws.amazon.com/s3)
 * Play framework 2.3.x (https://www.playframework.com/documentation/2.3.x/Installing)
 * MongoDB 2.6.x (http://docs.mongodb.org/manual)

###Installation
